title: Efficacy of accommodating variable-resistance training on muscle architecture, peak torque, and functional performance in patients with juvenile idiopathic arthritis: A randomized controlled trial
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Ragab K. Elnaggar, Alshimaa R. Azab, Saud M. Alrawaili, Ahmed S. Alhowimel, Mazyad A. Alotaibi, Mohamed S. Abdrabo, Rania R. Mohamed, Walaa A. Abd El-nabie
